examples.question: Ciao, sono Luca. Puoi suggerirmi una cena alternativa senza latticini per domenica?
examples.query1: MATCH (u:User {{name: 'Luca'}})-[:HAS_FABBISOGNO]->(f:Fabbisogno) OPTIONAL MATCH (u)-[:IS_ALLERGIC_TO]->(a:Allergen) RETURN u.name AS name, f.calories AS daily_calories, f.proteins AS daily_proteins, f.carbs AS daily_carbs, f.fats AS daily_fats, COLLECT(a.name) AS allergies;
examples.query2: MATCH (u:User {{name: 'Luca'}})-[:HAS_WEEKLY_PLAN]->(wp:WeeklyPlan)-[:HAS_DAILY_PLAN]->(dp:DailyPlan {{day: 'domenica'}})-[:HAS_MEAL]->(m:Meal {{type: 'cena'}})-[:CONTAINS]->(r:Recipe) RETURN r.name AS dish, r.type AS type, r.calories AS calories, r.proteins AS proteins, r.carbs AS carbs, r.fats AS fats ORDER BY r.type;
examples.query3: MATCH (u:User {{name: 'Luca'}}) MATCH (r:Recipe) WHERE NOT EXISTS {{ MATCH (r)-[:CONTAINS_ALLERGEN]->(a:Allergen) MATCH (u)-[:IS_ALLERGIC_TO]->(a) }} RETURN r.name AS dish, r.type AS type, r.calories AS calories, r.proteins AS proteins, r.carbs AS carbs, r.fats AS fats ORDER BY r.type;

examples.question: Ciao, mi chiamo Marco. Quali piatti alternativi senza glutine potrei mangiare sabato a pranzo?
examples.query1: MATCH (u:User {{name: 'Marco'}})-[:HAS_FABBISOGNO]->(f:Fabbisogno) OPTIONAL MATCH (u)-[:IS_ALLERGIC_TO]->(a:Allergen) RETURN u.name AS name, f.calories AS daily_calories, f.proteins AS daily_proteins, f.carbs AS daily_carbs, f.fats AS daily_fats, COLLECT(a.name) AS allergies;

examples.query3: MATCH (u:User {{name: 'Marco'}}) MATCH (r:Recipe) WHERE NOT EXISTS {{ MATCH (r)-[:CONTAINS_ALLERGEN]->(a:Allergen) MATCH (u)-[:IS_ALLERGIC_TO]->(a) }} RETURN r.name AS dish, r.type AS type, r.calories AS calories, r.proteins AS proteins, r.carbs AS carbs, r.fats AS fats ORDER BY r.type;

examples.question: Ciao, mi chiamo Giulia. Cosa potrei mangiare a pranzo martedì evitando crostacei?
